title: AI 101 for Teachers: Session 5 - Bringing AI into Your Classroom
image_desc: A stylized image of a teacher and students collaboratively working on a project involving a laptop and AI-related visuals, symbolizing the integration of AI in education.
narration: Welcome to session five of the AI 101 Teachers Professional Learning series.  We've reached the end, so let's explore how to bring what you've learned into your classroom.

title: Teaching with AI vs. Teaching about AI
content:
**Column 1: Teaching with AI**
Using AI as a tool to enhance teaching and learning.
Often involves teaching students how to use AI tools.
**Column 2: Teaching about AI**
Teaching students what AI is and how it works.
Fostering critical evaluation and creation of AI technologies.
image_desc: A split image; one side showing a teacher using AI software to personalize learning, the other showing students building a simple AI model.
narration: It's crucial to differentiate between teaching *with* AI and teaching *about* AI. Teaching with AI uses AI as a tool, while teaching about AI focuses on understanding AI's principles and implications.  We want students to be creators and critical evaluators, not just consumers.

title: Selecting AI Curricula
content:
Teacher support (lesson plans, activities)
Focus on "what" and "how" of AI
Critical thinking about societal impacts
Dispelling misconceptions and addressing fears
image_desc: A diverse group of students engaged in an AI-related project, showing collaboration and critical thinking.
narration: Choosing the right curriculum is key. Consider teacher support, a focus on AI's mechanics, opportunities for critical thinking about societal impact, and the dispelling of common misconceptions.

narration: Let's look at an example: Code.org's "How AI Works." This curriculum offers videos, lesson plans, and interactive activities to teach students about AI in a structured and engaging way.

title: Interactive AI Lessons
content:
Engaging widgets to simplify complex concepts.
Hands-on activities (e.g., training a bot to recognize fish).
Exploring ethical implications of data labeling.
Simulating neural networks with interactive widgets.
image_desc: A student interacting with a computer screen showing an interactive AI widget, demonstrating a machine learning concept.
narration: Many lessons incorporate interactive elements.  For example, students can train a bot to recognize images,  explore the ethical implications of data labeling, and simulate how neural networks work.

title: Khan Academy's Conmigo
content:
AI-driven teaching assistant and student tutor.
Features: Class Snapshot, Refresh My Knowledge, Co-creator Rubric.
Real-time feedback and personalized learning support.
image_desc: A screenshot of the Khan Academy Conmigo interface, highlighting its key features and user-friendly design.
narration: Khan Academy's Conmigo is an AI-powered teaching assistant that provides real-time feedback, personalized learning support, and helps teachers manage their workload.

title: AI-Assisted Assessment Tools
content:
Instant feedback and personalized learning.
Data-driven analytics for improved teaching strategies.
Promotion of active dialogue between teachers and students.
image_desc: A teacher reviewing student work on a computer screen displaying AI-generated feedback and analytics.
narration: AI can also assist with assessment.  Tools provide instant feedback, personalized learning, and data-driven insights to improve teaching strategies.

title: Four Components for Impactful AI Teaching
content:
**Column 1:**
Knowledge & Skill Development
Understanding Capabilities, Risks & Ethics
**Column 2:**
Community-Relevant AI Solutions
Practical Engagement in AI Creation
image_desc: A collage of images representing the four components: a teacher learning about AI, an ethical dilemma scenario, students working on a community-based AI project, and students building an AI model.
narration: For impactful AI teaching, focus on knowledge and skills, understanding AI's capabilities, risks, and ethics, finding community-relevant solutions, and providing practical engagement in AI creation.

title: Exploration: AI Professional Development
content:
Free online courses and resources.
Hands-on AI project guides.
Webinar series and PLN community.
image_desc: A screenshot of the Exploration website or a graphic representing its various resources (courses, projects, webinars).
narration: Exploration offers free professional development opportunities to help educators learn about and integrate AI into their teaching.

title: Conclusion: Embracing the Future of AI in Education
content:
Continue exploring AI resources.
Transform education using AI.

narration: This series has provided you with the tools to explore AI in education. Continue learning and embrace the transformative potential of AI in your classroom. Thank you!
